column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jon - Thanks for your review. Yes
column3: parking just about anywhere in Midtown can be tricky and/or costly
column4: depending on the night of the week
column5: etc. Did you park in the free garage around the corner? If not
column6: there is free valet on the bottom level and free self-parking on the upper 2nd and 3rd levels. We appreciate your visiting us
column7: and we hope to serve you again in the future.
